snippet: A 17-year-old pilot and two friends died in a crash in the Alabama woods Tuesday night, less than a mile from the Walker County Airport in Jasper, northwest of Birmingham.
abstract: Plane crash kills 17-year-old pilot and two friends in Alabama Woods, less than mile from the Walker County Airport in Jasper, northwest of Birmingham.
lead_paragraph: A 17-year-old pilot and two friends died in a crash in the Alabama woods Tuesday night, less than a mile from the Walker County Airport in Jasper, northwest of Birmingham.

headline.seo: Alabama: Teenage Pilot and 2 Passengers Die In Crash
headline.main: Alabama: Teenage Pilot and 2 Passengers Die in Crash
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Teenage Pilot and 2 Passengers Die In Crash
